Wedding photography and videographi

Welcome to Peony Luxe, a luxury wedding atelier! We’re capable of doing exceptional pictures and videos of espousals and engagements. Through the years and generations, everyone would like to save and share emotions and unique moments of their marriage. A very special day requires many things to plan. Memorable, a very important thing is inviting vocational wedding photography. Peony Luxe induces images and videos of luxurious level, underscoring the genuine emotions of the newlywed and all guests, capturing all unique moments, which shan’t be forgotten. We have vocationally highlighted hundreds of luxurious espousals and engagements. Thus, addressing Peony Luxe’s vocational wedding photography is a superb decision!

Peony Luxe: taste our luxurious offers

People choose Peony Luxe wedding photography because Peony Luxe is the best luxury boutique atelier nationwide. We’ve been providing wedding videography services for over 10 years, with dedication and approach to every affiance as a unique event in the history of every family. We respect the attempts of people in arranging their special day, understanding they’d like to have the best services, making everything refined, elegant, and memorable. That’s our goal as well: at espousals, we embrace wedding photography and videography in full entirety, while not distracting newlyweds or their guests, allowing them to completely focus on their roles. We create artistic and refined pictures and videos, catching the legend of the evanescent moment. If our readers want to have the utmost professional wedding photography atelier, then choosing Peony Luxe would be an astounding solution to affiances, the same as ‘twas best for thousands of soon-to-be-spouses!

WEDDING PHOTOGRAPHY &VIDEOGRAPHY SERVICES

Luxury wedding photography isn’t an everyday offer, so people might only have a loose idea of that in their heads, what it could include or how long our agency’s photographers would be present at the marriage. We invite our clients to take a look at our portfolio and become acquainted with our offers to make a reasonable choice of our luxurious service.

Also, we willingly provide assistance in picking the correct service if there are any hesitations. Due to our vocational advice about wedding videography and photography, it will be possible to define the optimal number of photographers for any espousal, the number of hours of their work, and the set of other services optimal for a client

LET`S START PLANNING YOUR BEST DAY

Thanks to the active participation in the one-of-a-kind day, our wedding videography agency will be able to create a holistic, powerful, and beautiful picture of the day (or several days, which is not a rare thing for modern affiances, especially those arranged in picturesque places in rural areas). We also can give vocational advice about the best ideas for taking pictures and videos considering the play of light and shade or background. Customers of Peony Luxe receive truly unforgettable, honest, and authentic pictures to remember that day for years to come.

You have found the best photography & videography agency for the wedding!

Our premium work is always centered on the clients, so they won’t have to chase us, trying to find out the details. It is our direct interest and responsibility to discuss everything beforehand, pick a proper package specifically for the espousal, and to agree on things to make this day perfect and as hassle-free as possible.

We thank our clients for choosing us to become their luxurious storytellers, wherever an event would have occurred — locally, domestically, or worldwide. A special day is special for our client no less than it is special for us, so we will take every aspect of it with utmost responsibility, not forgetting to capture the entire essence and fun of the event. Have any questions or issues left? We’re happy to discuss them to make sure the engagement or wedding is in great hands!

Our wedding photographers are happy to be a part of your day

memorable

Each wedding is unique, exciting and full of emotions, and we focus on the emotions. Our shooting style creates images that reveal the fearsome expressions of love and devotion you share. No security. Natural. Emotional. Treasured images for life.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Here are the most frequently asked questions we have about my photographers packages, take a minute to read all the listings, and feel free to contact us if you have any other questions!

I have gone to great lengths to make sure my booking process is easy and convenient. A retainer of 50% of your chosen package due in order to secure your date. The retainer fee is non-refundable. For the wedding, the remaining balance will need to be finalized 2 weeks prior to your wedding date, for family or engagement the final payment should be made on the day of the photoshoot by cash.
